title: EIPIP Meeting 95
body:
# Date and Time

Nov 29, 2023 at 16:00 UTC

# Location

Zoom: TBA in the Discord #eip-editing channel

YouTube Recording: [EIPIP Meetings](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpLrRIkDlBjDUUrGgF91pQw)

# Agenda

## 1. EIP Process Standardization
- [x] High-level [overview](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1OFUzFLXCjxfBtFJw2jL557U3g9MjgQYSlSVdBpKO2W0/edit#slide=id.p) of EIP - ERC - RIP repositories & standardization 
- [x] Working Group
  - GitHub: https://github.com/eips-wg
  - Rendered: https://eips.fyi/
- [x] Updates on [pending tasks for repo split](https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/issues/1) 
- [x] Web Page Rendering for EIP & ERC

[Guidelines for ERC authors](https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/issues/8)  to migrate Pull Requests from [EIP GitHub](ethereum/EIPs) to [ERC GitHub](ethereum/ERCs)

## 2. Discuss Open Issues/PRs, and other topics
- [ ] [EIP-7549 added in `Review` status](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/commits/master/EIPS/eip-7549.md)
### Call for Input

Call For Input | Status | Result | Comments
-- | -- | -- | --
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/283 | Open | - | Active for collecting responses (till Nov 16)
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/286 | Open | - | Active for collecting responses (till Nov 19)
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/287 | Open | - | Active for collecting responses (till Nov 19)
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/289 | Closed | Move EIP-7199 to `Withdrawn`  | 2 votes collected, both in favor of merging [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7225)
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/291 | Open | - | 1 Editor voted to oppose. Multiple other responses added. Active for collecting responses (till November 30, 2023)
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/293 | Open | - | 2 Editors opposed to merging the PR. Active for collecting responses (till Dec 09)


### Changes to `Final` proposals
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/74 | https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/75 | https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/76
- [ ] update ERC1271 Ref [comment](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/285#issuecomment-1788105803) @frangio
- [ ] [Post EIP/ERC Split: Represent each side as Camps in Ethereum Magicians](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/post-eip-erc-split-represent-each-side-as-camps-in-ethereum-magicians/16271) @NetWalker108 
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/61 (Draft proposition for ERC-1) @Joachim-Lebrun


### Manual Merge
_TBA_

## 3. Other discussions continued or updates from past meetings
### Changes to `Final` EIPs 
- Why `Final` EIPs are "Immutable"?
- Specify conditions under which `Final` EIPs can be updated.

## 4. EIPs Insight - Monthly EIPs status reporting.
- [Hackmd](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EIPsInsightNovember2023)
- [EIPsInsight.com](https://eipsinsight.com/insight/2023/11)

## 5. [EIP Editing Office Hour](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EIPEditingOfficeHour)
- Agenda [Meeting 29](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/298) & Recording [Meeting 28](https://youtu.be/exCcwWdH82s)
- Rename it to ERC Office Hour?
- Can we merge All ERC Dev Meeting & EIP Editing Office Hour?

## 6. Review action items from earlier meetings
- [Summary meeting 94](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/292#issuecomment-1813310428)

## Next Meeting date & time

We should test a wiki page per ERC on Ethereum Magicians forum (need to be a moderator or higher to create).  This could be used for security and current implementations.

Crypto recovery spam on Ethereum Magicians needs to be addressed.  Often a couple a day.

## Summary 
### 1. EIP Process Standardization
 #### High-level overview of EIP - ERC - RIP repositories & standardization
- @poojaranjan shared a [presentation](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1OFUzFLXCjxfBtFJw2jL557U3g9MjgQYSlSVdBpKO2W0/edit#slide=id.p) suggesting
  -  RIP proposals be added as Type = `Standard Track`,  Category = `Core`
  - EIP Template for each repo must contain ["EIP Header Preamble" as described in EIP-1](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1.md#eip-header-preamble)
  - Content of the proposal (aka EIP body) can be customized and added in `template.md` or `github prefix_template.md` at each GitHub repo.
  - A proposal, irrespective of the GitHub repo will follow the [Status flow for standardization as described in EIP-1](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1.md#eip-process). However, moving from one status to another can be customized by repo editors. Add your comments [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VaazpOfy4v2wXKvrCIEiU9zhGS9jV522KoonqZR9DrA/edit#gid=375986482).
  - Update RIP Editors to [EIP-1](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1.md#eip-editors) and [Reviewers sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VaazpOfy4v2wXKvrCIEiU9zhGS9jV522KoonqZR9DrA/edit#gid=1512379886)
  - Proposed Working Group based on GitHub repo
    - EIPs GitHub - Core 
    - ERCs GitHub - Wallet, ERC
    - RIPs GitHub - RIP
  - Website Layout should remain same, just add RIP tab to include proposals
  - Governance of a repo can be managed by (Repo editors (EIP/ERC/RIP Editor + Editor Associate + Working Group Members / Reviewers). Inclusion of a proposal, status change discussion can be done on respective dev meetings/ GitHub repos.
  - Maintain EIP-1 as Purpose and Guideline documents. Add links to specific Meta EIP/ERC/RIP to refer to the community to learn more.
  - Worth following the [recording](https://youtu.be/qgcphJxvVDs).

 #### Working Group
GitHub: https://github.com/eips-wg
Rendered: https://eips.fyi/
- @SamWilsn shared a presentation to explain the Working Group Charter
- Each Working group will have its own website, separate from the other. eg. https://core.eips.fyi
- Each of them will have own template, rendering system
- The [webpage](https://eips.fyi/) is envisioned to have proposals rendered based on Working Group
- GitHub Repos are based on Working Group. Each WG will have one repo. eg. Wallet and ERC will own independent repos and not share one GitHub repo.
- One category in repositories for each WG
- Membership will be defined in the charter
- For Q&A, follow [recording](https://youtu.be/qgcphJxvVDs).
- @poojaranjan proposed to begin with 4 WG and circle back in 2-3 months
- @xinbenlev volunteered to create ERC WG

#### Updates on https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/issues/1
- PandaPip wasn't available to provide update
- @SamWilsn loosen some of the eipw to merge PRs.

#### Web Page Rendering for EIP & ERC
- Discussed eips.fyi and continuing the format of preIn sent eips.ethereum.org
- We went overtime, to be continued discussing on ECH Discord.
